TopicTitle: Travel Log Cleared in Save Files and After Loading Game

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.3.1 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 Pro Version 22H2 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti | RAM: 32GB

 

I'm not entirely sure if this is a bug as there was the fix about save file size inflating due to the travel log, but since 0.1.3, saved games have a completely empty travel log in them, causing stats and logs of active flights to be completely reset if you load a saved game. The easiest way to achieve this is to start a flight, get it up to a noticeable amount of speed, land it, then save the game, load that save and recover the vessel. The stated highest velocity will be 0 m/s. The attached screenshot is the travel log portion of a save file with multiple active flights that should have travel log events like takeoff, SOI change, landing, etc.
